mapper.update:
update class_discuss
parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
discuss_content = #{discussContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
forward_id = #{forwardId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
like_count = #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_leaf = #{isLeaf,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
release_time = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sort_time = #{sortTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
reply_number = #{replyNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where discuss_id = #{discussId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update class_discuss set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publisher = #{publisher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discuss_content = #{discussContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, forward_id = #{forwardId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, like_count = #{likeCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_leaf = #{isLeaf,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, release_time = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sort_time = #{sortTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flg = #{delFlg,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, reply_number = #{replyNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} where discuss_id = #{discussId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update class_discuss set like_count = like_count + 1 where discuss_id = #{discussId} and del_flg = 0
